name: Clean up patrol
description:
Clean up patrol

You are on duty to clean up the sewers. It might get messy so be ready to rewind. Can you make it to the Beast?

Clean up patrol is my entry for Brackeys Jam 2020.2

Controls WAccelerateSBrake A,DSteer[hold] SpaceRewind abilityMouse left clickShootMouse right clickUse active abilityQSwitch active ability
